CustomField.description: This is used to have the sort order fo the display tiles. You can have up to 99 dynamically created. But the tested amount has been 3. If this is not provided there is no sorting pattern applied. This is recommended but not required.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to have the sort order fo the display tiles. You can have up to 99 dynamically created. But the tested amount has been 3. If this is not provided there is no sorting pattern applied. This is recommended but not required.
CustomField.label: Sort Order
